author: Ewa Kuczynski
text: Today is my #Birthday and I have to wait ages for #patient #transport to take me to the #dialysis unit for treatment as well. Hopefully the day will get considerably better.😊 https://t.co/wtwgPhYEgB

author: Ewa Kuczynski
text: Phoned my #GP on quick-dial at 8 am (when they open) & was already number 15 in the queue & forced to listen to the most hideous on hold music for 35 mins.😱 Now I have to wait for a GP to call me back.🥱 https://t.co/rDrule0W3R

author: Ewa Kuczynski
text: Wishing all my #Twitter #friends the brightest #Beltane #blessings. Artwork by Wendy Andrew.🤗#May https://t.co/zVyqXzQ9Zx
